channel.title: Depeche Mode on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Depeche Mode Concert Film Gets October Theatrical Release Date
item.description: ‘Depeche Mode: M,’ which debuted at Tribeca and chronicles the band’s 2023 Mexico City shows, will hit theaters starting Oct. 28.
